ai.notes: Slimed status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Starts with 60-40 split between #wZap and #wRain. Afterwards, move is based on the last two moves: NL (1) If the last move was #wRain, 70-30 split between #wZap and #wGust. NL (2) If the last move was #wGust, 60-40 split between #wZap and #wRain. NL (3) If the last two moves were both #wZap, 60-40 split between #wRain and #wGust. NL (4) Otherwise, 30-40-30 split between #wZap, #wRain, and #wGust.

NL (4) Otherwise, 30-40-30 split between #wZap, #wRain, and #wGust.

Starts with #wHeadbutt. Afterwards, 40-30-30 split between #wNibble, #wCorrosive #wSpit, and #wHeadbutt. Can't use #wCorrosive #wSpit or #wHeadbutt three times in a row or #wNibble twice in a row (if any of those limits have been reached, 50-50 split between the two other moves). NL NL In the first two normal fights in the act, the middle Hatchling starts with #wJust #wHatched, then 50-50 split between #wCorrosive #wSpit and #wHeadbutt.

ai.desc: Starts with #wCorrupting #wTouch or #wVigor #wDrain, then #wEnergy #wDrain. Afterwards cycles #wVoid #wSlam or #wVoid #wVolley -> #wCorrupting #wTouch or #wVigor #wDrain.
ai.notes: Void status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wCorrupting #wBite, then #wVoid #wGaze, then #wShadow #wClaw. Afterwards 60-40 split between #wCorrupting #wBite and #wShadow #wClaw, but can't use either move three times in a row.
ai.notes: Starts with #uVoid #uPressure 2 applied to the player. Dazed status cards from #wCorrupting #wBite go on top of the draw pile. Dazed status cards from #wVoid #wGaze go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Repeats #wPortal until 5 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

Repeats #wPortal until 5 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

Repeats #wPortal until 6 elementals have been summoned. Afterwards uses #wStrengthening #wRestoration, then #wChaotic #wEnergies, then repeats #wElemental #wBlast. NL NL Elementals are randomly chosen from Orb of Fire, Living Stormcloud, Opulent Offering, and Shimmering Mirage, with at most two of each appearing over the course of the fight.

ai.desc: Starts with #wBide, then #wEvolve, then repeats #wClaw. NL NL Evolution choices cycle as follows: NL (1) Enrage 2, Ritual 5, or Strength 20 NL (2) Beat of Death 1, Thorns 3, or Burns 4 NL (3) Buffer 5, Metallicize 25, or Max HP 75 NL (4) Frail Pulse, Dazed Pulse, or Abysstouched Pulse 2 NL (5) Artifact 5, Slimy Body, or Invincible 50. NL NL Evolution cycles after the first skip repeat only the first three chocies.

Starts with #wScythe. Afterwards equal chance of using each move, but always uses #wScythe if it hasn't been used in the last three moves, can't use #wCall #wProtector if there are 3 or more minions alive, can't use #wScythe or #wCall #wProtector three times in a row, and can't use #wStrengthen #wCarapace twice in a row.
